name: @ripreact/logger
description: An opinionated logger for browser devtools.
author: Marina Miyaoka <miyaokamarina@gmail.com> (https://twitter.com/miyaokamarina)

scripts.prepublish: tsc && babel src/index.ts -so dist/index.esm.js --config-file ./babel.config.esm.js && babel src/index.ts -so dist/index.cjs.js --config-file ./babel.config.cjs.js
